summary: Dagmar and her brother Lief, are excellent warriors, for this reason were so easily accepted the family, are skilled in combat with swords and efficient vampiric drain. Mortal followers for any enemy.
descriptionHtml:
Only you can to kill them, are equipped with vampiric drain, 1 hand combat, destruction perks, perks 1 hand combat, have the shout "Drain Vitality", are marked as married (but not tested).

The mod should work without problem and all because in vanilla base.
Compatible with:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41447/?]Immersive and customizable Castle Volkihar[/url]
Hope you enjoy!
